title: Intermediate Excel 2021
headline: This free online course is an intermediate Excel 2021 guide that describes the essential functions of this program.
description: This step-by-step guided course helps you learn essential functions in the program Microsoft Excel 2021. This course is a complete outlet to help you manage data. You will see what it can do for you and examine all its functions, including the use of formulas. We provide information to assist you in creating a spreadsheet that is readable and easy to navigate. We answer questions like ‘what is a function?’ or ‘why use a formula?’.
courseDescription:
This course on ‘Intermediate Excel 2021’ provides you with accurate knowledge of advanced calculation or computation capabilities. It describes and clarifies the features and functions of Excel 2021. This course guides you through specific information about the various logical functions, helping you understand their format and formulas. We provide the answers to questions relating to the Excel 2021 index, formulas and sorting on multiple columns. We discuss the ‘sort’ and ‘sort by’ functions and identify keyboard shortcuts to speed up your work.

This course will then prepare you to understand custom formulas. You will be able to correctly use the formats in Excel 2021 and know how to edit workbooks and worksheets to improve readability. Next, you will learn to evaluate ‘date’ formats and examine the distinct varieties of working with different filter options. We explain ‘applying custom formats’ and how to edit and use formatting in time and years. What tools help you edit and modify workbooks? What are the benefits of using formulas? This course will clarify these questions before finally conveying how to customise your own functions and formulas.

This course will give you the necessary tools and skills to become familiar with Excel 2021 if you are a beginner. It provides precise and straightforward methods you can apply in your working field. It is ideal for those already using Excel at work or for employees who want to learn how to use the spreadsheet to its full potential. Register for this training course and become confident in using this program.
